Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Events.ServerObservable
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
public class Game extends ServerObservable
Game class contains the main logic of "Master of Renaissance", which is divided in several macro-areas. The first area is the Player section, which contains information about the single player. The second area is the GameBoard section which contains the faith track and

    • addNewPlayer

      public void addNewPlayer​(Player player)
      Method addNewPlayer creates a new player in the game. The minimum length of Players is 1 elements, and the maximum is 4.
      Parameters:
      player - of type Player not null - the player to be added.

    • getPlayerByNickname

      public Player getPlayerByNickname​(String nickname)
      Method getPlayerByNickname finds the player identified by his nickname in the list of players.
      Parameters:
      nickname - of type String that is the nickname of the player.
      Returns:
      Player that is the desired player, null if there's no player with that nickname.

    • setCurrentPlayer

      public void setCurrentPlayer​(Player player)
      Method setCurrentPlayer updates the "currentPlayer" with the desired one.
      Parameters:
      player - of type Player that is the player to be set as current.

    • getPlayersNumber

      public int getPlayersNumber()
      Method getPlayerNumber returns the number of the players in this Game.
      Returns:
      int that is the number (1 to 4) of players of this Game Object.

    • getCurrentPlayer

      public Player getCurrentPlayer()
      Method getCurrentPlayer returns the currentPlayer of the game.
      Returns:
      the currentPlayer (type Player) of this Game object.

    • getPlayerByIndex

      public Player getPlayerByIndex​(int playerIndex)
      Method getPlayerByIndex finds the player identified by his index in the list of players.
      Parameters:
      playerIndex - of type int that is the index of the player.
      Returns:
      Player that is the desired player.

    • nextTurn

      public void nextTurn()
      Method nextTurn updates currentPlayer to the next player in "players" order.

      public int getCurrentPlayerId()
      Method getCurrentPlayerId is a getter of the current player id.

      the current player id

      public boolean hasDoneAction()
      Returns:
      true if the player has done an action, otherwise false

    • setHasDoneAction

      public void setHasDoneAction()
      sets the variable hasDoneAction to true

    • incrementOthersFpByDiscarding

      public void incrementOthersFpByDiscarding()
      increases the Faith Track position by 1 for all the players, except the current one, which is discarding resources

    • incrementFaithTrackPosition

      public void incrementFaithTrackPosition​(Player player)
      Method incrementFaithTrackPosition is used to increment the faith track position of a player you choose. If a vatican report is activated, it calls the handlers of the players. It also checks if the match is ending (a player arrives in the last cell)
      Parameters:
      player - is the chosen player

    • lorenzoTurn

      public SoloAction lorenzoTurn()
      Method to manage Lorenzo's turn in the Solo mode Lorenzo will act based on the SoloAction picked from the SoloAction pile checks if a Pile of DevelopmentCards is empty, then Lorenzo wins. It returns the activated solo action in this turn.
